Text: cheers, this is one of the best bunuels I think
Amazing film, that you VERY much! The picture and sound quality is excellent!

Great film and good quality audio/video. Thanks IggyPop for your other uploads too, your upload list reads like a best film list. 

The only thing I find lacking in quality is the subbing,  and not just in this torrent but many others (particularly Kurosawa's movies). It seems that half of the dialogue is either translated poorly or not translated at all, and it is very obvious even with languages you don't speak.

I am trying to open this .avi with VLC but subtitles file is not compatible. Moreover, it is not even readable (I tried regular text editor). Perhaps there is some sort of exotic encoding I should apply?
What a gem, thank u Iggypop..
